Title: Living History
Description:
My name is Nirobin. It is worth remembering, as I am a genius in the field of arcane codicology! Quite an accolade, if I say so myself... and I do say so!

I've spent countless hours fusing blue and bronze dragon magic to investigate history like never before. Today, you and I will experience the results of my effort!

Let's start by using my instruments on a fabulously preserved goblet uncovered from the Forbidden Reach.
ObjectivesText: Activate Nirobin's instruments to analyze the Intriguing Dracthyr Goblet.
